name: Hullabaloo 2: Electric Boogaloo
description:
Howdy!

This is the first game I have ever completed. After the corona pandemic forced me to shelter in place away from my college friends, I missed them very much. I decided to make a short, funny game that takes place at my college.

Even if you are not one of my college friends, you should still enjoy the game; I hope. Take a chance on me?

Obviously, as this game is very short, uses default assets, and is not going to win any awards, I have set the pricing to "$0 or donate". I only want your two cents, either in the comments or as a donation. :)

I believe this will be my only RPG Maker game, at least for a while. I am going to explore the Unity engine now and hopefully make something even better!

Sincerely,

Ethansito
